section.name: Basic info
section.description: Basic tank is the first tank you spawn in as.

section.name: Strategy
section.strategy:
Strong Against: Low upgraded tanks, bullet-shooting tanks with lower frontal DPS if the player is maxed out in bullet power and Reload.
Weak Against: Bullet Spammers, Overlords, highly upgraded tanks, high-level tanks, Bosses, Sniper tanks if caught off guard.
While playing teams modes, players should stay close to the Base and take out Polygons nearby when they are at a lower level. If the enemy team’s players are taking up most of the Leaderboard and/or are spawn-camping the player’s team, consider going to a different area of the spawn camp. Again, players should upgrade Max Health or Movement Speed.
Players should stay away from others as much as possible in non-team game modes. Try to refrain from fighting others.
Do not underestimate the Tank. Although it's a Tier 1 tank, it does not mean it can't kill you. A skilled Tank can easily kill other classes.
Bullet spammers can easily overwhelm the tank if they have enough Bullet Penetration because the Tank has only one cannon. If a player’s strategy is to wander around getting points mainly by killing all the Tanks they see, becoming a Triplet or a Sprayer could help them.
An Overlord could flank a basic tank; however, it is still appropriate to attack it from the front since the Tank doesn't have enough reload to destroy them all. But be careful, because a Tank with almost and/or fully maxed out Movement Speed may easily run away from them.
Beware of surprise rammers; players occasionally level up but choose to stay as a tank and can quickly upgrade and surprise their opponent. The player may be able to spot one if the enemy Tank is trying to get too close to them. When this happens, the player must kill them as quickly as possible.

content.section:
- Basic, Twin, Triple Shot, Quad Tank, Triplet and Octo Tank were the first tanks that were added to Diep.io before the public release.
- 6 max Penetration and Damage bullets of Basic Tank deals as much damage as Destroyer and can 2 shot a max level glass tank.

section.name: Stats
section.description:
The stats of a Tank are as follow:
- Regen: 1x Tank - Health: 50 (+20 for each point in Max Health, +2 for each extra level) - Body Damage: - Against shapes: 20 (+4 for each point in Body Damage) - Against tanks: 30 (+ 6 for each point in Body Damage) - Against bullets: 5 (+1 for each point in Body Damage) - Bullet Speed: x1 Tank - Bullet Penetration: 2 (+1.5 for each point in Bullet Penetration) - Bullet Damage: 7 (+3 for each point in Bullet Damage) - Reload time: 15t (-1t for each point in Reload) - Movement Speed: 1x Tank
